post.description: Check that buyer can use Mondu payment method
Creates a new billing configuration for the buyer

get.description: Gets all billing configurations for the buyer

put.description: Updates the billing contact details of an existing billing configuration

get.description: Show credit notes for specific invoice

post.description: Cancel Invoice not yet paid out. Also it cancels all Credit Notes for the Invoice

get.description: Returns all the invoices for specific order

404.description: When requested invoice does not exists

get.description: Returns all the invoices for specific merchant

schema.description: Status filter, it accepts non blank comma separated string of buyer status.
Merchant filter, it accepts non blank comma separated string of uuids v4.
Buyer filter, it accepts non blank comma separated string of uuids v4.

AccessToken.description: JWT signed with the authorization server's private key

InvoiceUuid.description: Invoice ID in UUID format of any version (v1 - v5).For instance: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000.

CreditNoteUuid.description: Credit note ID in UUID format of any version (v1 - v5).For instance: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000.

expires_in.description: TTL of the access token in seconds (Default is 8 hours)

access_token.description: JWT signed with the authorization server's private key

scope.description: A scope that user is granted

OrderAdjustState.description: The state that the order is being adjusted

CompletedLate.description: True if invoice is completed after due_date.

ExternalId.description: Reference ID of resource in external service

BuyerExternalRefId.description: Unique buyer reference ID from the merchant

Currency.description: Currency code according ISO_4217 i.e EUR

CountryCode.description: Two-letter country code (ISO_3166 Alpha 2 )i.e DE

Language.description: Two-letter language code according to ISO_639-1 i.e. en

NetTerm.description: Custom net term for merchant.Income value must be one of the predefined values in the account

InstallmentTerm.description: Custom installment term for merchant.Income value must be one of the predefined values in the account

minimum_installment_amount_cents.description: If the minimum monthly rate does not allow to offer installments.
If the minimum monthly rate does not allow to offer installments.

cancelation_reason.description: The cancelation reason if the order is canceled.

cancelation_notes.description: The cancelation notes if the order is canceled.

hosted_checkout_url.description: A URL to redirect buyers to the Mondu hosted checkout page.

externalReferenceId.description: Line item ID set by the merchant. It has to be unique and match to the external reference id of a line item sent to Mondu in create order request.

quantity.description: Number of items. It must be >= 1.

title.description: Name of the line item (product or service).

net_price_per_item_cents.description: The net price of line item without taxes, shipping cost or discounts.

tracking_url.description: An URL to a site with tracking.

return_tracking_url.description: An URL to a site with tracking.

quantity.description: Number of items. It must be >= 1.

external_reference_id.description: Invoice ID set by the merchant.

vendor_external_reference_id.description: Vendor external reference ID if the invoice is for a vendor order. It is required and has to be unique if the order is multi-basket. It has to match to the vendor external reference ID of a line sent to Mondu in create order request.

invoice_url.description: An URL pointing to a file containing an invoice.

gross_amount_cents.description: Invoice amount including taxes, discounts, shipping or any other cost. It has to be lower or equal to a line sent to Mondu in create order request. gross_amount_cents = net_amount_cents + tax_cents + shipping_price_cents + extra_fee_cents - discount_cents

tax_cents.description: Amount of tax to be applied to the invoice.

shipping_price_cents.description: Shipping price to be applied on this invoice.

extra_fee_cents.description: Extra fee to be applied on this invoice.

external_reference_id.description: Line item ID set by the merchant. It has to be unique and match to the external reference id of a line item sent to Mondu in create order request.

quantity.description: Number of items. It must be >= 1.

proof_of_delivery.description:
Proof of delivery file which is required
                              if the relevant flag is enabled on merchant level.

CreateCreditNoteRequest.description:
To decrease the value of an invoice due to full or partial returns,
                         the API allows for creation of a credit note. The credit note is linked
                         to the invoice and will decrease the expected payment from the buyer
                         for the outstanding invoice. The invoice will move into the complete state
                         once the new (lower) amount has been paid by the buyer.
                         One invoice can have many credit notes,
                         the credit notes are added together,
                         you can not delete credit note.

quantity.description: Number of items. It must be >= 1.

CreatingCreditNoteErrorObject.description:
When creating a credit note some fields are
                          required, like external_reference_id and gross_amount_cents.
                          Also, if you are sending line items, you have to send external_reference_id
                          and quantity for each item. Additionally, credit note can not be created
                          in case invoice is complete and in case credit note gross_amount_cents is
                          greater than invoice gross_amount_cents.

payment_method.description: Payment method for the factoring. Can be invoice or direct_debit

gross_amount_cents.description: Invoice amount including taxes, discounts, shipping or any other cost. gross_amount_cents = net_amount_cents + tax_cents + shipping_price_cents - discount_cents

invoice_url.description: The public URL of the invoice.

city.description: City, district, suburb, town, or village.

address_line1.description: Street, PO Box, or company name.

iban.description: IBAN of the buyer (only if the payment method is Direct Debit)

account_holder.description: Account holder name (only if the payment method is Direct Debit)

registration_id.description: Registration ID of the buyer (only if the buyer is not from Germany)

discount_cents.description: Amount of discount to be applied on this line.

shipping_price_cents.description: Shipping price to be applied on this line.

external_reference_id.description: Line item ID set by the merchant.

title.description: Name of the line item (product or service).

net_price_per_item_cents.description: The net price of line item without taxes, shipping cost or discounts.

tax_cents.description: Amount of tax to be applied on this line item. It is not required, if the tax amount is provided in the line object.

quantity.description: Number of items. It must be >= 1.

OrderAdjustSource.description: The source where the order adjustment came from.

OrderSource.description: The source where the order came from.

OrderSalesChannel.description: The sales channel through which the order came in.

OrderCancellationSource.description: The source where the cancellation of the order came from.

InvoiceSource.description: The source where the invoice came from.

currency.description:
Currency code according ISO_4217.
Note: the field is required in case gross_amount_cents is set.

gross_amount_cents.description: The gross amount of the order.

external_reference_id.description: Purchase ID set by the merchant

vendor_external_reference_id.description: Vendor external reference ID if the order is for vendor

gross_amount_cents.description: The gross amount of the order.

total_discount_cents.description: Discount to be applied on all order lines.

success_url.description: A URL to redirect buyers after a successful order from hosted checkout.

cancel_url.description: A URL to redirect buyers after a canceled order from hosted checkout.

declined_url.description: A URL to redirect buyers after a declined order from hosted checkout.

billing_configuration_uuid.description: UUID of an existing billing configuration

external_reference_id.description: Purchase ID set by the merchant

total_discount_cents.description: Discount to be applied on all order lines.

gross_amount_cents.description: The gross amount of the order.

external_reference_id.description: External order ID set by the merchant.

buyer_confirmed_at.description: Datetime that indicates when buyer confirmed an order. It is not required if async order creation is not used.

total_discount_cents.description: Discount to be applied on all order lines.

vendor_external_reference_id.description: Vendor external reference ID if the order is for vendor.It is required and has to be unique if the order is multi-basket.

discount_cents.description: Amount of discount to be applied on this line.

tax_cents.description: Amount of tax to be applied on this line. It is recommended to provide tax amount in line object, but it can be alternatively provided in the line item object.

shipping_price_cents.description: Shipping price to be applied on this line.

marketplace_fee_cents.description: Marketplace fee to be applied on this line.

buyer_fee_cents.description: Buyer fee to be applied on this line.

OrderLineItems.description: Array of line items grouped by the same line attributes.

external_reference_id.description: Line item ID set by the merchant.

title.description: Name of the line item (product or service).

net_price_per_item_cents.description: The net price of line item without taxes, shipping cost or discounts.

net_price_cents.description: The net price of all line items without taxes, shipping cost or discounts.

tax_cents.description: Amount of tax to be applied on this line item. It is not required, if the tax amount is provided in the line object.

quantity.description: Number of items. It must be >= 1.

product_sku.description: Stock-keeping unit number of line item.

variation_id.description: Variation for the line item (such as "small" or "green").

item_type.description: Type of line item (such as "service" or "product").

tax_cents.description: Amount of tax to be applied on this line. It is recommended to provide tax amount in line object, but it can be alternatively provided in the line item object.

marketplace_fee_cents.description: Marketplace fee to be applied on this line adjustment.

buyer_fee_cents.description: Buyer fee to be applied on this line adjustment.
